title: Projects
content: Here are some of the websites and apps I build for fun and/or to learn something new.

list.title: Hedera Helix
list.content: This dApp encourages long-term use of items and buying secondhand items by attaching a smart contract to each product, which contains a small additional deposit amount. 60% of this deposit is returned over time, 30% is given to a secondhand buyer and 10% is donated to an environmental charity.

list.title: The Hederian Mint
list.content: The Hederian Mint is a website that showcases a small collection of 3-dimensional NFTâ€™s representing digital HBAR coins. I started this project because I wanted to learn to create 3D art in Blender for a long time and because I wanted to create something cool for the Hedera community. So far I've sold 15 NFTs.

list.title: Codesparks
list.content: Codesparks is my personal portfolio website, which I build with Vue and Nuxt. I built this new website because my old website was no longer reflecting my current UX design and web development skills and because it offered a good opportunity to learn Bootstrap.
